alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 10:09AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of northeast St. Louis and northwestern Lake Counties through 1045 AM CDT... At 1008 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles northwest of Ely, to near Burntside Lake, to near Robinson, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Dangerous lighting and Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Locations impacted include... Ely, Winton, Basswood Lake, Fall Lake, Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness Near Trout Lake, Burntside Lake, White Iron Lake, Snowbank Lake, southern Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness, Robinson, Forest Center, Birch Lake, Ensign Lake, Bald Eagle Lake, Gabbro Lake, Ojibway Lake, Farm Lake, Bear Head Lake, Isabella Lake, and Disappointment Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake
